title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Fry the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs with pecorino and parmesan cheese.
Drain the spaghetti and mix it with the pancetta.
Quickly mix in the egg and cheese mixture off the heat.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and garam masala for at least 1 hour.
Grill the chicken until fully cooked.
In a pan, melt butter and add tomato puree.
Simmer the sauce, then stir in the heavy cream.
Add the grilled chicken to the sauce and cook for 5 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice.
